subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In six seasons, Tony Parker has overcome the doubts of his coach, of the team’s franchise player and of the front office and brought the Spurs within one victory of a third N.B.A. title in five years.
snippet: In six seasons, Tony Parker has overcome the doubts of his coach, of the team’s franchise player and of the front office and brought the Spurs within one victory of a third N.B.A. title in five years.
